page.title: 16WOKINGHAM - MEDIA
page.content: Wokingham is served by{local radio} in Reading.{Radio 210}broadcasts programmes of topical interest interspersed with national news and advertisements. The{Reading Evening Post}newspaper is circulated within the area.It is published Monday to Saturday each week.Editions reach newsagents early afternoon,later editions following until early evening. Wokingham has 2 mid-week newspapers published each Thursday,{The Wokingham {Times}and{The Wokingham News.}These keep people upto date on events in the immediate area and beyond.Tradesmen and individuals are able to advertise for sale anything from houses to pets. Free local handouts are circulated regularly and these supplement the above papers, often being a precis of earlier reported news.
